Text:
I'm getting this version and the 2x larger avi right now. Will compare and post notes when finished.

I have one question: Why use the avi-format when there are so many better formats to choose from? If you can get the same quality with smaller sizes, I think it's a waste of bandwidth to use avi or mpg, IMHO.

/ Johan

@twentyforty: Just got the avi and have checked both versions. I don't see any reason to use avi when such good quality can be obtained using better formats. Thanks for your efforts!

I hope TPB changes so the final result counts; not bit rates, or whatever.

Cheers,
Johan
